item.description:
Congresswoman Rosa DeLauro wants to hear your views!

Saturday, May 2nd
11:30 am to 1:30 pm
North Haven Public Library
17 Elm Street
North Haven, CT 06473

"This gives me the opportunity to speak with people one-on-one. Please come by and share your concerns with me. Sincerely, Rosa L. DeLauro"

Jim Palmer wrote: "Since she sincerely wants to hear from me, I think I'll head down there. Let's make it a meetup and hand out stuff to anyone else there that wants to talk to her."
item.name: Meet Congresswoman Delauro - Stop HR 875 the Organic/Natural Food Crimes Bill !
